name: Boss Puzzle
description:
Not a sliding puzzle again is what some may think. Boss puzzle isn’t just an ordinary sliding puzzle – it’s a next generation four puzzle. You may not only change between pictures and numbers. You have the option to choose the quantity of fields too. That means you have a lot of different possibilities outside the classic 3x3 or 4x4 sliding puzzle´s. You may e.g. choose a puzzle with 4x6 panels. Start with the difficulty that suits best to you. With the minimum of 3x3 fields and a maximum of 6x6 fields you have 16 different models of the world famous puzzle delight.
Still not enough for you? Correct - just choose one of our predefined designs or use a picture from your album or just take a photo of a new motive. You want to play the same motif again? No problem! Just shake your iPhone or iPod and off you go.
The picture is split into the number of panels you choose and distributed randomly. The panels are moved by touching them on the screen. Target of the game is to move all pieces of the puzzle to their respective place. If the motif proves to be too hard you can always change it to numbers and arrange them. The challenge is solved when the numbers are in the correct sequence or the pictures in their respective places. With a bit of luck entrance in the high score list is possible.
A timer is active during the game and the number of turns is counted to determine the top 10. There is a high score list per size and the records are ordered by time and the number of turns it took.
This app is a must have for every puzzle fan. Sliding, puzzling, thinking and the fun factor isn´t missing either.
We put a lot of effort into this game and would be delighted if you could tell us your wishes and aspirations to make this app even better.
Never give up because every puzzle is solvable
We wish you a lot of fun with Boss puzzle.
